SimpleGVXR  1.1.0
Welcome to gVirtualXRay, the library for the simulation of X-ray images from polygon meshes on the GPU. gVirtualXRay is an open-source,cross-platform system. SimpleGVXR is a simplified layer built on top of gVirtualXRay, intended to facilitate its use in rapid prototyping, education, interpreted languages. SimpleGVXR: i) is C++ library, ii) provides a simplified, easy-to-use, procedural interface without templates, iii) provides binders for other programming languages (Python 2 and 3, LUA, Ruby, R, TCL, Java, GNU Octave, Perl, Scilab, C# and Matlab).
